topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556d3bdb63687218efa90800#post_556d3bdb63687218efa90800
Chinese eat a lot of it in New Year because dumplings represent good fortune and prosperity. Chinese dumplings (Jiaozi) which is basically the same as gyoza, look old ancient Chinese gold ingots. And the word _jiaozi_ sounds like the Chinese word for paper money.

topics.body:
it keeps happening
!http://38.media.tumblr.com/e7d43f5506eb8fd130210ca743788f78/tumblr_npaoxyRzRg1rk23vqo1_1280.gif!
"If you showed up to my panel at Momocon, you managed to get a sneak peak of this!

But here she is, in Not-Photographed-Off-A-Projector-Screen form!

Shiromori

(Ya’ll were close :V)

Designed by me, with the turn around developed by @artsyfeathersartsyblog​, and the puppet fleshed out by @chloepoisonhearts​.

What role does she play in all this?  What is she after?  WHY is there a tree growing from her head?  Will I ever actually EXPLAIN all this in a straight forward manner?

…

Probably not!

Just try to avoid Freaking Out."
